name: promotion
content: Get the first-ever shareable bundle promo from MyFi! Enjoy and share up to 10GB for surfing with your family and friends with the all-new myVoucher. Just access the Hotspot at your nearest store to avail. Visit https://www.myfi.com.ph for more info.

name: billing
content: Hi, {{ client_name }}! Just a friendly reminder, your bill for account # {{ service_account_number }} amounting to P{{ amount }} is due {{ date }}. Your billing statement has been sent to your billing/email address.
